import React,{useState} from 'react'; import homeImg from './homeimg.png'; export default function About() { const [hoveredButton, setHoveredButton] = useState(null); const handleMouseEnter = (button) => { setHoveredButton(button); }; const handleMouseLeave = () => { setHoveredButton(null); }; return (

LifeLens

LifeLens
window.location.href = "/home"} onMouseEnter={() => handleMouseEnter('home')} onMouseLeave={handleMouseLeave} > HOME
window.location.href = "/services"} onMouseEnter={() => handleMouseEnter('services')} onMouseLeave={handleMouseLeave} > SERVICES
window.location.href = "/sign-in"} onMouseEnter={() => handleMouseEnter('signin')} onMouseLeave={handleMouseLeave} > SIGN IN

Welcome to LifeLens

 Your Personal Journey, Captured and Understood.

  LifeLens is a personal diary web application aimed at helping users express and manage their emotions by creating, storing, and reflecting on diary entries. The app's focus on emotional well-being makes it a powerful tool for mental health and self-reflection, offering users a secure space to document and explore their feelings.

  • Easy complaint registration process
  • Real-time tracking of complaint status
  • Notifications for updates on your complaints
  • Dedicated problem solvers to ensure timely resolutions

Our Services

Complaint Registration

Easily register your complaints through our user-friendly platform. Provide all necessary details to help us understand and address your issue better.

Real-Time Tracking

Keep track of your complaint's status in real-time. Receive notifications and updates as your complaint moves through the resolution process.

Feedback and Improvements

Your feedback is valuable to us. After your complaint is resolved, provide feedback to help us improve our services and make the system even better for future users.
